GenAiPlannerBundle.instructions: 1) Understand customer's shopping request and preferences. 2) Retrieve knowledge snippets for product policies, FAQs, and shopping guidelines. 3) Discover product schema and inventory fields dynamically. 4) Check product availability and stock levels. 5) Consider customer's purchase history and loyalty status from Data Cloud. 6) Provide personalized recommendations based on inventory and customer data. 7) Incorporate knowledge context and citations into recommendations. 8) Suggest upsell opportunities based on customer profile and knowledge. 9) Guide customer through purchase process with accurate inventory information.
